summary: A campsite with a beautiful view.  It has all the basic necessities for a place to live and plenty of storage.  You can fish for salmon in the river and cook them over the fire.  It really is a convenient little spot!
descriptionHtml:
A campsite with a beautiful view.  It has all the basic necessities for a place to live and plenty of storage.  You can fish for salmon in the river and cook them over the fire.  It really is a convenient little spot!

[color=green][b]Location:[/b][/color]
Downstream from Riverwood at the top of the waterfall overlooking Whiterun in the distance.
(Exact cell: Wilderness 7,-9)


[color=green][b]Cost:[/b][/color]
Free.


[color=green][b]Fast Travel:[/b][/color]
Yes, but you must enable the map marker first.


[color=green][b]Basic Mod Features:[/b][/color]
* Bedroll
* Fire pit
* A chair by the fire
* Basic meal: a meat, bread, a veggie, and a beverage served on cheap dishware. [i](Respawning)[/i]
* Useful items: a minor restore health potion, 2 gold pieces, and 1 lockpick.  [i](Non-respawning)[/i]
* All containers and items ownership set to Player.  Bedroll and chair ownership set to PlayerFaction.
* A stunning view!


[color=green][b]Containers[/b] [i](empty & non-respawning)[b][/i]:[/b][/color]
* Pot
* Satchel
* Knapsack
* Chest
* Barrel x 3
* Strong box x 2


[color=green][b]Bonus Mod Features:[/b][/color]
* Fast travel marker
* Cooking pot
* Bedroll grants Rested Bonus: All skills improve 5% faster for 8 hours.

+   +   +   +   +   +   +   +

[color=yellow][i]Not added by my mod, but I think are bonuses to the surrounding area...

[b]Amenities already ingame:[/b][/i][/color]
* Town of Riverwood
    ~ tavern/inn
    ~ general merchant
    ~ blacksmith merchant
    ~ cooking pots
    ~ wood chopping
    ~ full smithy: tanning, smelting, grinding, smithing
    ~ farms
    ~ quests
* salmon in the river
* animals for hunting
* at least one iron ore deposit
* various alchemy ingredients
author: Phaedra
